workflow.name: 40-drbd
workflow.longdesc: Configure a DRBD cluster resource. Also creates a multistate resource wrapping the DRBD resource.

parameters.stepdesc: The ID specified here is for the DRBD cluster resource.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for the DRBD cluster resource. Also used as the base for the created multistate cluster resource.

parameter.name: drbd_resource
parameter.longdesc: The name of the DRBD resource from the DRBD configuration file.

parameter.name: drbdconf
parameter.longdesc: Full pathname of the DRBD configuration file

workflow.crm_script:
primitive ocf:linbit:drbd params drbd_resource=""
drbdconf=""
op monitor depth="0" timeout="20" interval="20" role="Slave" op monitor depth="0" timeout="20" interval="10" role="Master"
ms ms- params master-max=1 master-node-max=1 clone-max=2 clone-node-max=1 meta notify=true
